fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Gain (n/2 rounded up) herbs each night, where n is the night number.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Spend two herbs on a Herb of Healing, healing a player for the night and giving them Powerful defense. Spend three herbs on a Herb of Truth, which will force them to reveal their true role. Spend three herbs on a Herb of Poison, either poisoning your target or all your target's visitors. You may only use one type of herb at a time.
